body_content.explanation: someone who shoots at people from a place where they cannot be seen:
examples: He was shot and fatally injured by a sniper.
Sniper fire has claimed countless lives these past few weeks.

body_content.explanation: someone who waits until nearly the end of an auction (= public competition to buy goods) on a website before saying how much money they will offer, in order to be more successful than other people trying to buy the same thing
